au.aklein.metajava.internal

Interface ClassFile

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassFileReader

    public interface ClassFile
    A service provider interface for classes which read and parse class files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClassElement.ClassElementBuilder generateClassElementBuilder()
      Generate a ClassElement.ClassElementBuilder which may be processed further before construction.
      ClassFileException getLastError()
      Returns the latest error that occured during reading, if avaliable.
      boolean readClassFile(java.nio.file.Path path, boolean preserveClassBuffer)
      Read and parse the given class file, returning if the operation is successful or not.

    • Method Detail

      • readClassFile

        boolean readClassFile(java.nio.file.Path path,
                      boolean preserveClassBuffer)
        Read and parse the given class file, returning if the operation is successful or not.
        Parameters:
        path - - The Path to the class file
        preserveClassBuffer - - A boolean value of whether or not to hold on to the byte array of class data. If true, resulting ClassElement objects will contain the byte array of their corresponding class file.
        Returns:
        true if the file is read without errors, otherwise return false.

      • generateClassElementBuilder

        ClassElement.ClassElementBuilder generateClassElementBuilder()
        Generate a ClassElement.ClassElementBuilder which may be processed further before construction.
        Returns:
        a ClassElement.ClassElementBuilder for the class file read.

      • getLastError

        ClassFileException getLastError()
        Returns the latest error that occured during reading, if avaliable.
        Returns:
        the most recent ClassFileException, otherwise null.
